ch0147_00_hugh/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Heading out for
more adventures today?
ch0147_00_hugh/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re ever in trouble, you can lean on me! I’ll
lend you my strength anytime!
ch0147_00_hugh/7101_0701_01_10:
It goes without saying, but you better be raising
your partner with love.
ch0147_00_hugh/7101_0701_02_10:
Even though it might look like all the others, there’s
only one of your partner Pokémon in the world...
ch0147_00_hugh/7101_0701_03_10: No one could ever replace it!
ch0147_00_hugh/7102_0701_01_10:
Team Break isn’t the only group of evildoers
out there.
ch0147_00_hugh/7102_0701_02_10:
If they even think about stealing Pokémon, I’ll take
them all down myself!
ch0147_00_hugh/7103_0701_01_10:
My little sister still lives in my hometown, Aspertia
City. Sometimes I wonder what she’s up to.
ch0147_00_hugh/7103_0701_02_10: I want her to always be happy and smiling.
ch0147_00_hugh/7103_0701_03_10:
I just hope her and her Pokémon are in good
spirits together!
ch0147_00_hugh/7104_0701_02_10:
The more Pokémon battles you have, the stronger
you get, right?
ch0147_00_hugh/7104_0701_03_10:
I’ll need your help fighting evildoers, so you
better keep training!
ch0147_00_hugh/7105_0701_01_10:
Ever since I met you, you’ve seemed like you have
good instincts, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0147_00_hugh/7105_0701_02_10: It looks like I was right!
ch0147_00_hugh/7105_0701_03_10:
You treat your Pokémon with respect, and you’re
always getting stronger!
ch0147_00_hugh/7105_0701_04_10:
I’m lucky that I met someone besides my partner
Pokémon that I can trust!
ch0147_00_hugh/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I’m going to give you something good!
ch0147_00_hugh/1701_0702_01_10:
There’s no point in just keeping it around. Don’t be
shy. Use it!
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0701_01_10:
In the past, my sister had her Purrloin stolen by
Team Plasma.
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0701_02_10:
By the time we got it back, it’d evolved into a
Liepard and forgotten about my sister and me.
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0701_03_10:
But little by little, they were able to grow
close again.
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0702_01_10:
Never take your eyes off the people and
Pokémon closest to you, got it?
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0702_02_10:
There may be villains like Team Break on
this island...
ch0147_00_hugh/2501_0702_03_10:
But there are also many sync pairs I can rely on,
so I don’t think I have to worry!
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0701_01_10:
I have one reason for wanting to become stronger
alongside my partner...
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0701_02_10: To protect what’s important to me!
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0701_03_10:
Even if I get hurt...I’ll stay true to my
convictions and fight until the end!
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0702_01_10: My partner is always willing to lend me strength.
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0702_02_10:
There’s more connecting us to each other than
a Poké Ball...
ch0147_00_hugh/2511_0702_03_10:
When we fight together, I can feel my partner’s
emotions and ambitions vividly!
ch0147_00_hugh/3001_0701_01_10:
C’mon—let’s head out and get stuff done! We’re
gonna train ALL day.
ch0147_00_hugh/3003_0701_01_10:
We’ve still got loads of time. C’mon, let’s go do
some more training!
ch0147_00_hugh/3005_0701_01_10:
We sure got a lot done today! Let’s give it our all
tomorrow, too.
